name: Midpoint CC
overview: Midpoint CC, LLC develops ecommerce and data management systems for the list marketing industry. It provides online list rental fulfillment and ecommerce software for email and postal mailing lists; and custom data processing services for list and direct marketing professionals. The company’s services include data processing services, analysis, database services, list rental fulfillment technology and software, Listkey system setup and customization, offline list rental fulfillment services, and custom programming and technology solutions. Midpoint CC also provides ListKey 4.0 Professional, an online count and order system with ecommerce functionality for list and data organizations; ListKey 4.0 Storefront for list and data marketers with specialized target marketing-vertical industry-needs and private labeling opportunities; ListKey List Manager for subscriber, response, and survey-based files in a list management environment; ListKey Data Pipe to integrate data and mailing list sales into an existing ecommerce site as print-on-demand, business services, and online direct mail; ListKey 4.0 Data Share that enables owners to share and expand their data distribution via the ListKey owners network of sites; and ListKey Portal that enables to plug and play-start sales and marketing program. It serves data distributors, list owners and brokers, compilers, list managers, aggregators, and businesses with special Internet access needs in the United States and internationally. Midpoint CC, LLC was formerly known as Alvion, LLC and changed its name in September 2008. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Cape Coral, Florida. As of September 15, 2008, Midpoint CC, LLC operates as a subsidiary of Acxiom Corp.
